'''''-ion''''' is a [[Quenya]] suffix that has two meanings. 
==-ion<sup>1</sup>==
Used as a masculine patronymic suffix in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p.190</ref>
===Examples<sup>1</sup>===
*[[Tar-Aldarion]] = ''"Son of the trees"''
*[[Eldarion]] = ''"Son of the Eldar"''
*Morion = ''"dark one"''; referring to [[Morgoth]]<ref>{{LR|P1III2}}, p.72</ref>

==-ion<sup>2</sup>==
Used as a suffix to denote a region, any (fairly extensive) region between obstacles such as rivers or mountains. The longer is ''-ionde''.<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p.43</ref>
===Examples<sup>2</sup>===
*Ingolondë = ''“Country of the Noldor”''<ref>{{LR|P2III}}</ref>
==See also==
*''-iondo'' = a masculine patronymic suffix.<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p.190</ref>
*''[[-yon]]'', ''[[-yon]]de'' = a patronimic suffix.
